titleStmt.title: Morbus epidemicus: or, the danger of self-seeking; discovered in a sermon preached before the right honorable, the Lord Major of the city of London, at Mercers-Chappel, Novemb. 18. 1649. By John Cardell.
titleStmt.author: Cardell, John.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 22 1649"; the 50 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
